content:
Hallo zusammen.
Wenn ich im Simplifier-Projekt mir die Spezifikation der Verordnungssoftware-Schnittstelle V1.01 anschaue, fehlen dort einige Dependencies. Können Sie sich diese einmal anschauen? Z.B. bekomme ich bei 74_PR_VM_Medikament die Meldung http://fhir.de/StructureDefinition/medication-de-basis/0.2.

Danke sehr.

Hi @Mareike Przysucha, I just looked into this and the project is depending an older version of the Simplifier.Core.STU3 package which didn't include the profile http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/shareablevalueset.
Newer versions of that package do include it. However, it would be even better to update the dependency of the project to the official package hl7.fhir.r3.core now that's available (see our latest blog).

Apologies @Mareike Przysucha, I see now I was diving into the validation issues with the http://fhir.de/StructureDefinition/medication-de-basis/0.2 profile (so these), where it misses http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/shareablevalueset.

But reading better you are referring to issues within project Verordnungssoftware-Schnittstelle V1.01, where it apparently misses dependency http://fhir.de/StructureDefinition/medication-de-basis/0.2, like on this page: https://simplifier.net/verordnungssoftware-schnittstelle/74prvmmedikament. This, however, might very well be caused by the error above.

@Simone Heckmann @Patrick Werner @Stefan Lang Can one of you fix the dependencies on the BasisprofilDE project? :point_up:
@Ward Weistra Thanks for your replies. I think one of the admin of the project must add the dependencies.
@Maximilian Reith: Können Sie sich dies evtl. einmal anschauen oder das intern weitergeben?

Probably the owners of 'Basisprofil DE (STU3)' should first fix their dependency on the FHIR core package and then release a new basisprofile.de package.
Next the owners of 'Verordnungssoftware-Schnittstelle V1.01' will need to add that package as their dependency on https://simplifier.net/Verordnungssoftware-Schnittstelle/~dependencies. That should allow Simplifier to find the right profile.

Mareike Przysucha said:

Ward Weistra Thanks for your replies. I think one of the admin of the project must add the dependencies.

Merci

Ward Weistra said:

Probably the owners of 'Basisprofil DE (STU3)' should first fix their dependency on the FHIR core package and then release a new basisprofile.de package.
Next the owners of 'Verordnungssoftware-Schnittstelle V1.01' will need to add that package as their dependency on https://simplifier.net/Verordnungssoftware-Schnittstelle/~dependencies. That should allow Simplifier to find the right profile.

And thank you for this investigation

@Maximilian Reith It seems the dependencies of the Basisprofil have been updated and a new package has been released. You should now be able to add a dependency on basisprofil.de 0.2.40 to make the canonicals resolve.
I can only find the files in JSON there. Are the XML files available as well? Thanks in advance!
